title: I use duckduckgo in Firefox and everything was working well. I turn on today and can't load anything. There was an update 2 days ago 1-22-2022.
content: As of today.1-22-2022. no page or app will load. I have been using duckduckgo on Firefox for years with no problem. An update yesterday 1-23-2022 took place, now all i get is a blue dash in the tab moving side to side, but no loading. Does Firefox have a technician Who can contact me? Waiting for another user is not acceptable.
